mapper.insert: INSERT INTO IMAGE_ANALYSIS (IMAGE_ANALYSIS_SQ, ANGER, CONTEMPT, FEAR, DISGUST, HAPPINESS, NEUTRAL, SADNESS, SURPRISE, FACE_TOP, FACE_LEFT, FACE_WIDTH, FACE_HEIGHT, ANS_SQ) VALUES (IMAGE_ANALYSIS_SQ.NEXTVAL, TO_NUMBER(#{anger}), TO_NUMBER(#{contempt}), TO_NUMBER(#{fear}), TO_NUMBER(#{disgust}), TO_NUMBER(#{happiness}), TO_NUMBER(#{neutral}), TO_NUMBER(#{sadness}), TO_NUMBER(#{surprise}), TO_NUMBER(#{faceTop}), TO_NUMBER(#{faceLeft}), TO_NUMBER(#{faceWidth}), TO_NUMBER(#{faceHeight}), TO_NUMBER(#{ansSq}) )
mapper.select: SELECT ROUND(SUM(ANGER)/COUNT(*),2) ANGER, ROUND(SUM(CONTEMPT)/COUNT(*),2) CONTEMPT, ROUND(SUM(FEAR)/COUNT(*),2) FEAR, ROUND(SUM(DISGUST)/COUNT(*),2) DISGUST, ROUND(SUM(HAPPINESS)/COUNT(*),2) HAPPINESS, ROUND(SUM(NEUTRAL)/COUNT(*),2) NEUTRAL, ROUND(SUM(SADNESS)/COUNT(*),2) SADNESS, ROUND(SUM(SURPRISE)/COUNT(*),2) SURPRISE, MIN(FACE_TOP) FACE_TOP, MAX(FACE_LEFT) FACE_LEFT, MAX(FACE_TOP) - MIN(FACE_TOP) + MAX(FACE_WIDTH) FACE_WIDTH, MAX(FACE_LEFT) - MIN(FACE_LEFT) + MAX(FACE_HEIGHT) FACE_HEIGHT, COUNT(*) totalCnt FROM IMAGE_ANALYSIS WHERE ANS_SQ = #{ansSq}

SELECT A.INTERVIEW_SQ, AVG(D.ANGER)*100 ANGER, AVG(D.CONTEMPT)*100 CONTEMPT, AVG(D.FEAR)*100 FEAR, AVG(D.DISGUST)*100 DISGUST, AVG(D.HAPPINESS)*100 HAPPINESS, AVG(D.NEUTRAL)*100 NEUTRAL, AVG(D.SADNESS)*100 SADNESS, AVG(D.SURPRISE)*100 SURPRISE, AVG(D.FACE_TOP) FACE_TOP, AVG(D.FACE_LEFT) FACE_LEFT FROM INTERVIEW A, QUESTION B, ANSWER C, (SELECT ANS_SQ, ROUND(SUM(ANGER)/COUNT(*),3) ANGER, ROUND(SUM(CONTEMPT)/COUNT(*),3) CONTEMPT, ROUND(SUM(FEAR)/COUNT(*),3) FEAR, ROUND(SUM(DISGUST)/COUNT(*),3) DISGUST, ROUND(SUM(HAPPINESS)/COUNT(*),3) HAPPINESS, ROUND(SUM(NEUTRAL)/COUNT(*),3) NEUTRAL, ROUND(SUM(SADNESS)/COUNT(*),3) SADNESS, ROUND(SUM(SURPRISE)/COUNT(*),3) SURPRISE, MAX(FACE_TOP) - MIN(FACE_TOP) FACE_TOP, MAX(FACE_LEFT) - MIN(FACE_LEFT) FACE_LEFT FROM IMAGE_ANALYSIS GROUP BY ANS_SQ) D WHERE A.MEM_ID = #{memId } AND A.INTERVIEW_SQ = B.INTERVIEW_SQ AND B.QUEST_SQ = C.QUEST_SQ AND C.ANS_SQ = D.ANS_SQ AND ROWNUM <= 5 GROUP BY A.INTERVIEW_SQ
